Ã‚Â³    troops, tanks, gunships and bombers while fighting right along side     Ã‚Â³

Ã‚Â³                                  Synopsis                                  Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                                  ~~~~~~~~                                  Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                                                                            Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³     A lone world rebels against an oppressive imperial power. As a key     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³     commander in the uprising, you must bring this war from planet to      Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³     planet, engaging hostile forces for control of a multitude of 3D       Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³      worlds. Uprising puts you in the drivers seat of the Wraith, a        Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   high-tech assault tank that serves as a mobile command center on the     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³    3D battlefield. The Wraith is lethal in its own right, equipped with    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³    sophisticated weapons and defensive systems that wreak havoc on the     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  enemy. But as powerful as the Wraith is, its not nearly enough to take    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³     on an entire enemy world by itself. To win, you must call in and       Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³    direct a variety of futuristic AI units, troops, tanks, gunships, and   Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       bombers each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Only by        Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   deploying your units effectively can victory be achieved! Theres one     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³    small catch, however. Deploying these allied forces depends on your     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  securing enough POWER to fuel your war effort. To mine power, you must    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³     establish and hold strategic bases called Citadels throughout the      Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³     enemy landscape. Once a Citadel is established, its ready to mine      Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³    power. The more citadels you have, the more power you can generate,     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³  the more units you can deploy, and the greater your chances of winning    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                                 this war.                                  Ã‚Â³

Ã‚Â³                                                                            Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³     Uprising offers more action than a military sim, and more strategy     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³       than a 3D shooter. Establish Citadel bases, mine power, build        Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   factories, and fight along side legions of allied units all in an        Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³   immersive, first-person 3D world. Uprising gives new meaning             Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³                      to the concept "You Are There."                       Ã‚Â³

Ã‚Â³   action. Robust peripheral support includes joysticks, 3D eyewear and     Ã‚Â³
